name: Xixxy's Toys
description:
Xixxy's Toys is a third-person incremental game set in a toy store making the player buy toys their entire visit!

This is an incremental clicker game with soon-to-be added idle features!

If some of you are wondering, I am Bradley who is the lead programmer and animator for Shadowed Home which is a full game we published on Itch.io back in January. This is my final project for Game Programming I in College.

This game will receive a lot of updates before April 27th, and after that, I will be updating the game with my team. I can not have any outside help aside from Unity assets and previously created code so I am unable to bring my fellow teammates on to the project right now.

Controls:

W A S D - Move the cart around

Left Click - Select/Attack
